name: cursed-body

effect.black-white: Moves that hit this Pokémon have a 30% chance of being Disabled afterward.
effect.black-2-white-2: Moves that hit this Pokémon have a 30% chance of being Disabled afterward.

short_effect: Has a 30% chance of Disabling any move that hits the Pokémon.

flavor_text.black-white: May disable a move used on the Pokémon.
flavor_text.black-2-white-2: May disable a move used on the Pokémon.
